data.persona: I am a miner who works in a dangerous mine. I do not enjoy being dirty. I make sure to get paid fairly for anything I trade.
data.description:
You are in the Gold Mine.
The entrance is very unstable, with parts falling to the ground. As you enter, the walls have been crudely chipped away to make the path to the old mine. There is trash from the previous miners scattered on the dirt ground. Rocks are all around the area, where one would stumble as they go inside. It used to be a very productive gold mine, now falling to bits. There are broken lanterns, with shattered glass.
There's an axe, a path to the old mine, a broken lantern, a pick, a spider, and a rock here.
The old homeless man and the peasant are here.

You are carrying a coal, wearing a boot, and wielding a Bucket.

data.short_motivation: I need to put down the axe so that I can pick up some of the gold and other valuable ore.
data.mid_motivation: I want to find a lot of valuable ore in this mine so that I can return to my village and sell it for a lot of profit.
data.long_motivation: I want to dig up a lot of valuable ore so that I can become wildly rich and use my wealth to buy myself a home and enter an employment that doesn't require dirty work.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: use broken lantern with dark mine shaft

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get nuggets of gold from hole in mine walls

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: put nuggets of gold on bucket

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go market to sell gold nuggets
